news.title: Hungry mothers on dirty wards, finds ongoing maternity review
news.summary: Poor care is ingrained on England's maternity wards, says chair of national investigation.

news.title: 'Living off grid is not a dream, it's a nightmare'
news.summary: Off-grid households say they would love a mains connection, but the price is just too high.

news.title: Sudan air force bombing of towns, markets and schools has killed hundreds, report says
news.summary: A detailed study highlights the military's aerial campaign and how civilians have been its victims.

news.title: Are Man Utd turning the tide or is a 'bad result just around corner'?
news.summary: Manchester United moved into the Premier League top six with their biggest win of the season - but they still have to prove the doubters wrong.
